entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:27 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
